t: Amazon's New Budget Food Brand Shows US Shoppers Are Still Struggling - Business Insider
s: September 11, 2024 - Amazon's new "no-frills brand," Amazon Saver, leans into a trend that Target has tapped recently with its Dealworthy line of products, while Walmart's long-established Great Value brand is bought by 86% of households, according to Numerator data. Roughly a quarter of shoppers surveyed by Numerator say they buy store brands as a way to save money. Private-label groceries have been a source of some relief ...
